pages.about-us: About RelaxHotel - Luxury and Comfort in Every Detail RelaxHotel Home About us Casino Our Mission At RelaxHotel, our mission is to redefine hospitality by providing unparalleled experiences that inspire and delight our guests. We are dedicated to creating a welcoming environment where comfort, luxury, and personalized service converge seamlessly. With a commitment to exceeding expectations, we strive to anticipate our guests' needs and provide memorable moments that leave a lasting impression. From luxurious accommodations and gourmet dining to exceptional spa services and state-of-the-art amenities, every aspect of RelaxHotel reflects our passion for hospitality excellence. Our mission is to ensure that each guest feels valued and cherished, making RelaxHotel their preferred choice for unparalleled hospitality. Hotel Services Luxury Accommodations Discover the pinnacle of comfort and sophistication with our luxury accommodations at RelaxHotel. Each room and suite is thoughtfully designed to provide an oasis of tranquility, featuring plush furnishings, modern amenities, and exquisite décor. Whether you’re here for a romantic getaway, a business trip, or a family vacation, our luxurious spaces ensure an unforgettable stay. Gourmet Dining Savor the finest flavors with our gourmet dining experiences at RelaxHotel. Our award-winning chefs craft exquisite dishes using the freshest ingredients, blending traditional techniques with innovative flair. Whether you're in the mood for an elegant dinner, a casual lunch, or a sumptuous breakfast, our diverse dining options cater to every palate. Spa and Wellness Immerse yourself in tranquility with our Spa and Wellness offerings at RelaxHotel. Our serene spa is a haven of relaxation, featuring a range of luxurious treatments designed to rejuvenate your body and mind. Enjoy soothing massages, revitalizing facials, and holistic therapies performed by our skilled therapists. Casino: Step into a world of excitement and glamour at the RelaxHotel Casino. Our state-of-the-art gaming floor offers a wide array of games to suit every taste, from classic table games like blackjack and roulette to the latest slot machines. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice looking for fun, our casino provides a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere. Event Spaces: Discover versatile and elegant event spaces at RelaxHotel, ideal for hosting a wide range of gatherings and celebrations. Whether you're planning a corporate meeting, a conference, a wedding, or a social event, our dedicated team ensures every detail is meticulously planned to perfection. Choose from our sophisticated ballrooms, intimate boardrooms, and versatile banquet halls, all equipped with state-of-the-art technology and stylish decor. Concierge Service: At RelaxHotel, our Concierge Service is dedicated to enhancing your stay with personalized assistance and attention to detail. Whether you need restaurant recommendations, theater tickets, transportation arrangements, or local insights, our knowledgeable concierge team is at your service. At RelaxHotel, we use cookies to enhance your user experience on our website. Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help us optimize site functionality, remember your preferences, and provide personalized content and advertisements. We also use cookies to collect anonymous statistics on how you use our site, which helps us improve its functionality and usability. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - RelaxHotel RelaxHotel Home About us Casino Privacy Policy - RelaxHotel At RelaxHotel, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information. By using our website and services, you consent to the practices described in this policy. Information We Collect Personal Information: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, including but not limited to your name, email address, phone number, payment information, and booking details. Non-Personal Information: We may collect non-personal information such as browser type, device information, and usage data to help us improve our website and services. How We Use Your Information To Provide Services: We use your personal information to process reservations, provide customer support, and deliver the services you request. To Improve Our Services: We may use non-personal information to analyze website usage, enhance user experience, and improve our offerings. To Communicate with You: We may use your contact information to send you updates, promotional materials, and other information related to your bookings and interests. You can opt out of these communications at any time. Sharing Your Information Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you, under strict confidentiality agreements. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law, or if we believe that such action is necessary to comply with legal processes, protect our rights, or ensure the safety of our users and the public. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies help us understand how you use our site, remember your preferences, and improve our services. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. Your Rights Access and Correction: You have the right to access and correct your personal information. If you need to update or correct your information, please contact us. Data Portability: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child, we will take steps to delete such information promptly. At RelaxHotel, we use cookies to enhance your user experience on our website. Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help us optimize site functionality, remember your preferences, and provide personalized content and advertisements. We also use cookies to collect anonymous statistics on how you use our site, which helps us improve its functionality and usability. Accept Decline RelaxHotel Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Home About Us Casino Contact Us 12-16 Artillery Ln, London E1 7LS, Great Britain +44-20-5975-1251

pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - RelaxHotel RelaxHotel Home About us Casino Terms of Use for RelaxHotel Welcome to RelaxHotel. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. Acceptance of Terms By using our website, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our site. Modification of Terms RelaxHotel reserves the right to change these terms at any time. Any modifications will be effective immediately upon posting on the site. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. Booking and Reservations All bookings and reservations are subject to availability. We reserve the right to refuse any booking at our discretion. You must be at least 18 years old to make a reservation. Payment Payments for reservations must be made in accordance with the terms specified at the time of booking. We accept various payment methods as indicated on our website. Cancellation and Refund Policy Cancellation and refund policies vary depending on the type of reservation. Please review the specific terms provided during the booking process. Failure to comply with the cancellation policy may result in charges. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in and check-out times are specified at the time of booking. Early check-in or late check-out requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Use of the Website You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of others. You must not use the site to transmit or post any material which is defamatory, offensive, or illegal. Intellectual Property All content on the RelaxHotel website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of RelaxHotel or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. Limitation of Liability RelaxHotel shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Great Britain. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Great Britain. At RelaxHotel, we use cookies to enhance your user experience on our website. Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help us optimize site functionality, remember your preferences, and provide personalized content and advertisements. We also use cookies to collect anonymous statistics on how you use our site, which helps us improve its functionality and usability.
